## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G17450](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G17450)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtHMP45, HIPP21</u>
- **Gene Name:** HEAVY METAL ASSOCIATED PROTEIN 45, heavy metal associated isoprenylated plant protein 21
- **Description:**   Heavy metal transport/detoxification superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2157457
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
